Package dev.project276.entity

Class Patrol

java.lang.Object
dev.project276.entity.Entity
dev.project276.entity.MovingEntity
dev.project276.entity.Enemy
dev.project276.entity.Patrol
public class Patrol
extends Enemy
Enemy class that moves towards the player only if it can see the player. Otherwise just moves in a line.
